TextBody:
Hello,

If you are using Hyper-V Manager for hosting the EPP server image, then you will need Hyper-V Manager
(Windows Server 2016)  version 10.0.14393.0.
Alternatively you can use any of the supported virtual environments which can be seen here  :





You can find more information and also download epp server images for on-premise environments from this location :
Your Endpoint Protector Virtual Appliance Download Link

Best Regards,
Alin
ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0BQiyM:ref
Subject: Can't access to web gui after install EEP VM    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0BQiyM:ref ]

thaks

TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000BQiyM:ref

hello, i've not a hyper-v manager 2016 pr vmware scenario, on my lab, i've only hyper-v with OS win server 2012 R2 datacenter.
is there any workaround to allow at your solution to run on my host virtualizzator?
thanks
Subject: Netwrix Support Ticket #410948 - Can't access to web gui after install EEP VM

TextBody:
Hi Massimiliano,

You will have to use one of the supported virtualization software I provided in my previous email.
For example, you may use Oracle VirtualBox which is a free and open source virtualization product for enterprise use.

Thank you and Best regards,
Alin
